newsitem.title: USA: EIP Microwave names Foster president, COO.
newsitem.headline: EIP Microwave names Foster president, COO.

text.p: EIP Microwave Inc said Wednesday it named Lewis Foster as president and chief operating officer, replacing acting president John Bishop who has resigned.
Foster previously served as president of EIP from 1976 to 1986. He will report to J. Bradford Bishop, chairman and chief executive.
In addition, the company said Chief Financial Officer John Ardizzone has resigned to take a position at another company.
In its statement, EIP did not name a replacement for Ardizzone and an official was not available for comment.
